DBsheetConfig.query: SELECT T1.CurveId, T1.GroupingId, T1.CurveDescription, T5.value VolatilityType, T6.value Extrapolation, T7.value IncludeAtm, T8.value DayCounter, T9.value Calendar, T10.value BusinessDayConvention, T1.Tenors, T1.Strikes, T13.value IborIndex, T14.id DiscountCurve FROM ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationCapFloorVolatilities T1 INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesVolatilityType T5 ON T1.VolatilityType = T5.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesExtrapolationType T6 ON T1.Extrapolation = T6.value INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBool T7 ON T1.IncludeAtm = T7.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesDayCounter T8 ON T1.DayCounter = T8.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar T9 ON T1.Calendar = T9.value INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBusinessDayConvention T10 ON T1.BusinessDayConvention = T10.value INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesIndexName T13 ON T1.IborIndex = T13.value INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TodaysMarketCurveSpecs T14 ON T1.DiscountCurve = T14.id

field.name: VolatilityType
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value VolatilityType,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesVolatilityType !T! ORDER BY !T!.value

field.name: Extrapolation
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value Extrapolation,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesExtrapolationType !T! ORDER BY !T!.value

field.name: IncludeAtm
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value IncludeAtm,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBool !T! ORDER BY !T!.value

field.name: DayCounter
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value DayCounter, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesDayCounter !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: Calendar
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value Calendar, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: BusinessDayConvention
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value BusinessDayConvention,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBusinessDayConvention !T! ORDER BY !T!.value

field.name: IborIndex
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value IborIndex,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesIndexName !T! ORDER BY !T!.value

field.name: DiscountCurve
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.id DiscountCurve,!T!.id FROM ORE.dbo.TodaysMarketCurveSpecs !T! ORDER BY !T!.id
